body:
Comment 2: 
The "RFC" in question is perhaps http://mimesniff.spec.whatwg.org/. It is indeed titled
as "MIME Sniffing", and could be applied to any content. It really is heavily geared
towards HTTP (see all the "HTTP" references, as well as the security model).

I can't see the general utility of this code beyond where it is, though. As Russ says,
this is not a file(1) replacement, and I doubt it will ever be. It might not be in a
perfect place right now, but it's arguably close enough.
_Labels changed: added **priority-low**, removed **priority-medium**._
